itineraries.title: Kerala 4 Days: Trivandrum → Varkala → Alleppey → Kochi
itineraries.summary: Beach, backwaters, and heritage with slow travel emphasis.

days.morning: Arrive in Trivandrum. Visit Padmanabhaswamy Temple (dress modestly).
days.afternoon: Head to Kovalam Lighthouse Beach for a calm lunch and sea time.
days.evening: Sunset at Hawa Beach; try local seafood and stroll the promenade.

days.morning: Drive to Varkala (60 km). Coffee with cliff views at North Cliff.
days.afternoon: Relax at Varkala Beach; optional Ayurveda massage.
days.evening: Sunset on the cliff trail; dinner at a slow cafe.

days.morning: Drive to Alleppey (110 km). Board a day houseboat or shikara.
days.afternoon: Cruise past paddy fields and coconut groves; village lunch.
days.evening: Golden hour on canals; dock and unwind.

days.morning: Drive to Kochi (55 km). Explore Fort Kochi streets and Chinese fishing nets.
days.afternoon: Visit Mattancherry Palace and Jew Town; cafe breaks.
days.evening: Kathakali performance (optional) and dinner before departure.

itineraries.title: Rajasthan 7 Days: Jaipur → Pushkar → Udaipur → Jodhpur → Jaisalmer
itineraries.summary: Heritage circuit covering forts, palaces, and desert landscapes with slow exploration.

days.morning: Arrive in Jaipur. Visit Hawa Mahal from outside, then explore City Palace.
days.afternoon: Lunch at local thali restaurant. Visit Jantar Mantar observatory.
days.evening: Stroll through Bapu Bazaar. Dinner at rooftop with city views.

days.morning: Early visit to Amber Fort. Explore palace courtyards and mirror work.
days.afternoon: Drive to Pushkar (150 km). Check in and relax.
days.evening: Sunset at Pushkar Lake. Explore ghats and temples.

days.morning: Morning walk around Pushkar ghats. Visit local cafes.
days.afternoon: Drive to Udaipur (280 km) through Aravalli hills. Scenic stops.
days.evening: Arrive Udaipur. Evening walk at Lake Pichola.

days.morning: Visit City Palace complex overlooking Lake Pichola.
days.afternoon: Boat ride to Jag Mandir. Lunch at lakeside cafe.
days.evening: Sunset from Gangaur Ghat. Explore old city lanes.

days.morning: Drive to Jodhpur (250 km). Visit Mehrangarh Fort.
days.afternoon: Explore fort museum and palaces with audio guide.
days.evening: Walk through blue city lanes. Clock Tower market visit.

days.morning: Drive to Jaisalmer (285 km). Check in and rest.
days.afternoon: Explore Jaisalmer Fort living fort with shops and havelis.
days.evening: Sunset at Gadisar Lake. Dinner at rooftop with fort views.

days.morning: Explore fort interiors and craft shops at leisure.
days.afternoon: Drive to Sam Sand Dunes (40 km). Camel ride (optional).
days.evening: Sunset over dunes. Folk music and dinner. Return for departure.

itineraries.title: Goa 4 Days: Beaches, Heritage & Slow Vibes
itineraries.summary: Balanced mix of North Goa beaches, South Goa serenity, and Old Goa heritage.

days.morning: Arrive in Goa. Head to Anjuna or Vagator Beach. Breakfast shack.
days.afternoon: Beach time, swim, and lunch. Explore Chapora Fort for sunset views.
days.evening: Dinner at beachside cafe. Optional: Night market if Saturday.

days.morning: Visit Old Goa churches: Basilica of Bom Jesus and Se Cathedral.
days.afternoon: Drive to Panaji. Explore Fontainhas Latin Quarter. Goan lunch.
days.evening: Walk along Mandovi River. Dinner cruise (optional).

days.morning: Drive to South Goa. Visit Palolem Beach for calm vibes.
days.afternoon: Lunch at beach shack. Swim and relax. Optional kayaking.
days.evening: Sunset at Cabo de Rama Fort. Dinner at Agonda.

days.morning: Visit Colva Beach or Benaulim. Breakfast at local cafe.
days.afternoon: Last beach time. Try Goan fish curry rice. Shopping for souvenirs.
days.evening: Sunset view and departure preparations.

itineraries.title: Himachal 6 Days: Manali → Kasol → Dharamshala Circuit
itineraries.summary: Mountains, valleys, and monasteries with adventure and peace.
itineraries.bestTime: March to June, September to November

days.morning: Arrive in Manali. Check in and rest. Visit Hadimba Temple.
days.afternoon: Walk through Old Manali. Lunch at cafe with mountain views.
days.evening: Stroll along Mall Road. Dinner and acclimatize.

days.morning: Drive to Solang Valley (15 km). Paragliding or zorbing (optional).
days.afternoon: Ropeway ride for panoramic views. Lunch at dhaba.
days.evening: Return to Manali. Relax at hotel or cafe.

days.morning: Drive to Kasol (75 km) through Kullu Valley. Scenic stops.
days.afternoon: Check in. Explore Kasol market and riverside cafes.
days.evening: Walk along Parvati River. Dinner at Israeli cafe.

days.morning: Drive to Barshaini (20 km). Trek to Tosh village (5 km, 2-3 hours).
days.afternoon: Explore Tosh. Lunch at village cafe with valley views.
days.evening: Trek back or stay overnight in Tosh. Starry night.

days.morning: Drive to Dharamshala (200 km). Long scenic journey.
days.afternoon: Arrive McLeod Ganj. Visit Tsuglagkhang Complex (Dalai Lama Temple).
days.evening: Explore McLeod Ganj market. Tibetan dinner.

days.day: Day 6 — Triund Trek or Leisure & Departure
days.morning: Option 1: Trek to Triund (9 km, 4-5 hours). Option 2: Visit Norbulingka Institute.
days.afternoon: Lunch and last mountain views. Shopping for Tibetan crafts.
days.evening: Departure from Dharamshala or overnight for next day flight.

itineraries.title: Karnataka 5 Days: Coorg → Mysuru → Hampi Heritage Trail
itineraries.summary: Coffee plantations, royal palaces, and ancient ruins with diverse Karnataka.

days.morning: Arrive in Coorg (Madikeri). Visit Raja's Seat for valley views.
days.afternoon: Coffee plantation tour. Learn coffee making process.
days.evening: Walk through Abbey Falls. Dinner with Kodava cuisine.

days.morning: Leisurely morning in Coorg. Visit Dubare Elephant Camp (optional).
days.afternoon: Drive to Mysuru (120 km). Check in and rest.
days.evening: Visit Brindavan Gardens for musical fountain show.

days.morning: Visit Mysore Palace. Explore ornate halls and courtyards.
days.afternoon: Climb Chamundi Hills. Visit Chamundeshwari Temple. City views.
days.evening: Explore Devaraja Market. Buy Mysore silk and sandalwood.

days.morning: Drive to Hampi (340 km). Long journey with lunch break.
days.afternoon: Arrive Hampi. Visit Virupaksha Temple and Hampi Bazaar.
days.evening: Sunset from Hemakuta Hill with boulder landscape views.

days.morning: Visit Vittala Temple Complex. Famous stone chariot and musical pillars.
days.afternoon: Explore Royal Enclosure and Lotus Mahal. Lunch at local restaurant.
days.evening: Last views of Hampi ruins. Depart or stay overnight.

itineraries.title: Uttarakhand 5 Days: Rishikesh → Mussoorie → Nainital
itineraries.summary: Spiritual Ganges, hill station charm, and lake serenity.
itineraries.bestTime: March to June, September to November

days.morning: Arrive Rishikesh. Visit Laxman Jhula and Ram Jhula.
days.afternoon: Walk through ashram areas. Lunch at organic cafe.
days.evening: Attend Ganga Aarti at Triveni Ghat or Parmarth Niketan.

days.morning: White water rafting on Ganges (16 km stretch, 2-3 hours).
days.afternoon: Lunch and relax. Optional: Visit waterfall or yoga session.
days.evening: Leisurely walk along Ganges. Dinner at river cafe.

days.morning: Drive to Mussoorie (75 km). Check in and rest.
days.afternoon: Walk on Mall Road. Visit Gun Hill by ropeway.
days.evening: Sunset views. Explore local shops and cafes.

days.morning: Drive to Nainital (300 km). Long scenic journey.
days.afternoon: Arrive and check in. Boating on Naini Lake.
days.evening: Walk on Mall Road. Dinner at lakeside restaurant.

days.morning: Visit Naina Devi Temple. Take cable car to Snow View Point.
days.afternoon: Explore Eco Cave Gardens. Last lake views and lunch.
days.evening: Shopping for local handicrafts. Departure.

itineraries.title: Ladakh 7 Days: Leh → Nubra → Pangong → Tso Moriri
itineraries.summary: High altitude adventure with lakes, valleys, and monasteries.

days.morning: Arrive in Leh (3,500m). Complete rest at hotel.
days.afternoon: Light walk to Leh Market. Stay hydrated.
days.evening: Visit Shanti Stupa for sunset. Early dinner and rest.

days.morning: Visit Hemis Monastery (largest in Ladakh). Museum and murals.
days.afternoon: Explore Thiksey Monastery. Similar to Potala Palace.
days.evening: Visit Rancho School (3 Idiots fame) at Shey. Return to Leh.

days.day: Day 3 — Nubra Valley via Khardung La
days.morning: Early start. Cross Khardung La (5,359m). Photo stop at pass.
days.afternoon: Descend to Nubra Valley (120 km total). Visit Diskit Monastery.
days.evening: Camel ride at Hunder sand dunes. Stay in Nubra.

days.morning: Drive from Nubra to Pangong via Shyok route (150 km).
days.afternoon: Arrive at Pangong Lake (4,350m). Marvel at changing colors.
days.evening: Sunset at lakeside. Stay in camps near lake.

days.morning: Drive to Tso Moriri via Mahe Bridge (240 km). Spectacular route.
days.afternoon: Stop at Chumathang hot springs (optional). Continue journey.
days.evening: Arrive at Tso Moriri. Peaceful lakeside evening. Stay in Korzok.

days.day: Day 6 — Tso Moriri to Leh via Tso Kar
days.morning: Early morning at Tso Moriri. Bird watching (Brahminy ducks).
days.afternoon: Drive back to Leh via Tso Kar (220 km). Salt lake stop.
days.evening: Arrive Leh. Rest and last evening in Leh market.

days.morning: Visit Hall of Fame Museum. Learn about Ladakh's military history.
days.afternoon: Last minute shopping at Leh market. Tibetan artifacts, pashmina.
days.evening: Departure from Leh. Carry altitude memories.
